EmailTemplate.name: VIP Follow Up 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Only 3 days left to schedule your call with The Knot!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Case.Contact},
I tried giving you a call today to schedule your storefront walk-through, but unfortunately, we weren’t able to connect.To easily schedule a call at your convenience, I’ve included a link to schedule. Please pick the date/time that works best for you, or give us a call.
Talk soon!
{!case.account.Strategy_Specialist__r.name}
